actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 (49 U.S.C. 1301 et seq.) to include Hawaii in the provisions for certification of all-cargo air service.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the issuance of all-cargo air service certificates for air service between points in Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 (49 U.S.C. 1301 et seq.) to include Hawaii in the provisions for certification of all-cargo air service.
